actions.name: AcceptInboundConnection
actions.description: Grants permission to the destination domain owner to accept an inbound cross-cluster search connection request

actions.name: AcceptInboundCrossClusterSearchConnection
actions.description: Grants permission to the destination domain owner to accept an inbound cross-cluster search connection request. This permission is deprecated. Use AcceptInboundConnection instead

actions.name: AddDataSource
actions.description: Grants permission to add the data source for the OpenSearch Service domain

actions.name: AddTags
actions.description: Grants permission to attach resource tags to an OpenSearch Service domain

actions.name: AssociatePackage
actions.description: Grants permission to associate a package with an OpenSearch Service domain

actions.name: AuthorizeVpcEndpointAccess
actions.description: Grants permission to provide access to an Amazon OpenSearch Service domain through the use of an interface VPC endpoint

actions.name: CancelDomainConfigChange
actions.description: Grants permission to cancel a change on an OpenSearch Service domain

actions.name: CancelElasticsearchServiceSoftwareUpdate
actions.description: Grants permission to cancel a service software update of a domain. This permission is deprecated. Use CancelServiceSoftwareUpdate instead

actions.name: CancelServiceSoftwareUpdate
actions.description: Grants permission to cancel a service software update of a domain

actions.name: CreateApplication
actions.description: Grants permission to create an OpenSearch Application

actions.name: CreateDomain
actions.description: Grants permission to create an Amazon OpenSearch Service domain

actions.name: CreateElasticsearchDomain
actions.description: Grants permission to create an OpenSearch Service domain. This permission is deprecated. Use CreateDomain instead

actions.name: CreateElasticsearchServiceRole
actions.description: Grants permission to create the service-linked role required for OpenSearch Service domains that use VPC access. This permission is deprecated. OpenSearch Service creates the service-linked role for you

actions.name: CreateOutboundConnection
actions.description: Grants permission to create a new cross-cluster search connection from a source domain to a destination domain

actions.name: CreateOutboundCrossClusterSearchConnection
actions.description: Grants permission to create a new cross-cluster search connection from a source domain to a destination domain. This permission is deprecated. Use CreateOutboundConnection instead

actions.name: CreatePackage
actions.description: Grants permission to add a package for use with OpenSearch Service domains

actions.name: CreateServiceRole
actions.description: Grants permission to create the service-linked role required for Amazon OpenSearch Service domains that use VPC access

actions.name: CreateVpcEndpoint
actions.description: Grants permission to create an Amazon OpenSearch Service-managed VPC endpoint

actions.name: DeleteApplication
actions.description: Grants permission to delete an OpenSearch Application

actions.name: DeleteDataSource
actions.description: Grants permission to delete the data source for the OpenSearch Service domain

actions.name: DeleteDomain
actions.description: Grants permission to delete an Amazon OpenSearch Service domain and all of its data

actions.name: DeleteElasticsearchDomain
actions.description: Grants permission to delete an OpenSearch Service domain and all of its data. This permission is deprecated. Use DeleteDomain instead

actions.name: DeleteElasticsearchServiceRole
actions.description: Grants permission to delete the service-linked role required for OpenSearch Service domains that use VPC access. This permission is deprecated. Use the IAM API to delete service-linked roles

actions.name: DeleteInboundConnection
actions.description: Grants permission to the destination domain owner to delete an existing inbound cross-cluster search connection

actions.name: DeleteInboundCrossClusterSearchConnection
actions.description: Grants permission to the destination domain owner to delete an existing inbound cross-cluster search connection. This permission is deprecated. Use DeleteInboundConnection instead

actions.name: DeleteOutboundConnection
actions.description: Grants permission to the source domain owner to delete an existing outbound cross-cluster search connection

actions.name: DeleteOutboundCrossClusterSearchConnection
actions.description: Grants permission to the source domain owner to delete an existing outbound cross-cluster search connection. This permission is deprecated. Use DeleteOutboundConnection instead

actions.name: DeletePackage
actions.description: Grants permission to delete a package from OpenSearch Service. The package cannot be associated with any domains

actions.name: DeleteVpcEndpoint
actions.description: Grants permission to delete an Amazon OpenSearch Service-managed interface VPC endpoint

actions.name: DescribeDomain
actions.description: Grants permission to view a description of the domain configuration for the specified OpenSearch Service domain, including the domain ID, service endpoint, and ARN

actions.name: DescribeDomainAutoTunes
actions.description: Grants permission to view the Auto-Tune configuration of the domain for the specified OpenSearch Service domain, including the Auto-Tune state and maintenance schedules

actions.name: DescribeDomainChangeProgress
actions.description: Grants permission to view detail stage progress of an OpenSearch Service domain

actions.name: DescribeDomainConfig
actions.description: Grants permission to view a description of the configuration options and status of an OpenSearch Service domain

actions.name: DescribeDomainHealth
actions.description: Grants permission to view information about domain and node health, the standby Availability Zone, number of nodes per Availability Zone, and shard count per node

actions.name: DescribeDomainNodes
actions.description: Grants permission to view information about nodes configured for the domain and their configurations- the node id, type of node, status of node, Availability Zone, instance type and storage

actions.name: DescribeDomains
actions.description: Grants permission to view a description of the domain configuration for up to five specified OpenSearch Service domains

actions.name: DescribeDryRunProgress
actions.description: Grants permission to describe the status of a pre-update validation check on an OpenSearch Service domain

actions.name: DescribeElasticsearchDomain
actions.description: Grants permission to view a description of the domain configuration for the specified OpenSearch Service domain, including the domain ID, service endpoint, and ARN. This permission is deprecated. Use DescribeDomain instead

actions.name: DescribeElasticsearchDomainConfig
actions.description: Grants permission to view a description of the configuration and status of an OpenSearch Service domain. This permission is deprecated. Use DescribeDomainConfig instead

actions.name: DescribeElasticsearchDomains
actions.description: Grants permission to view a description of the domain configuration for up to five specified Amazon OpenSearch domains. This permission is deprecated. Use DescribeDomains instead

actions.name: DescribeElasticsearchInstanceTypeLimits
actions.description: Grants permission to view the instance count, storage, and master node limits for a given OpenSearch version and instance type. This permission is deprecated. Use DescribeInstanceTypeLimits instead

actions.name: DescribeInboundConnections
actions.description: Grants permission to list all the inbound cross-cluster search connections for a destination domain

actions.name: DescribeInboundCrossClusterSearchConnections
actions.description: Grants permission to list all the inbound cross-cluster search connections for a destination domain. This permission is deprecated. Use DescribeInboundConnections instead

actions.name: DescribeInstanceTypeLimits
actions.description: Grants permission to view the instance count, storage, and master node limits for a given engine version and instance type

actions.name: DescribeOutboundConnections
actions.description: Grants permission to list all the outbound cross-cluster search connections for a source domain

actions.name: DescribeOutboundCrossClusterSearchConnections
actions.description: Grants permission to list all the outbound cross-cluster search connections for a source domain. This permission is deprecated. Use DescribeOutboundConnections instead

actions.name: DescribePackages
actions.description: Grants permission to describe all packages available to OpenSearch Service domains

actions.name: DescribeReservedElasticsearchInstanceOfferings
actions.description: Grants permission to fetch Reserved Instance offerings for Amazon OpenSearch Service. This permission is deprecated. Use DescribeReservedInstanceOfferings instead

actions.name: DescribeReservedElasticsearchInstances
actions.description: Grants permission to fetch OpenSearch Service Reserved Instances that have already been purchased. This permission is deprecated. Use DescribeReservedInstances instead

actions.name: DescribeReservedInstanceOfferings
actions.description: Grants permission to fetch Reserved Instance offerings for OpenSearch Service

actions.name: DescribeReservedInstances
actions.description: Grants permission to fetch OpenSearch Service Reserved Instances that have already been purchased

actions.name: DescribeVpcEndpoints
actions.description: Grants permission to describe one or more Amazon OpenSearch Service-managed VPC endpoints

actions.name: DissociatePackage
actions.description: Grants permission to disassociate a package from the specified OpenSearch Service domain

actions.name: ESCrossClusterGet
actions.description: Grants permission to send cross-cluster requests to a destination domain

actions.name: ESHttpDelete
actions.description: Grants permission to send HTTP DELETE requests to the OpenSearch APIs

actions.name: ESHttpGet
actions.description: Grants permission to send HTTP GET requests to the OpenSearch APIs

actions.name: ESHttpHead
actions.description: Grants permission to send HTTP HEAD requests to the OpenSearch APIs

actions.name: ESHttpPatch
actions.description: Grants permission to send HTTP PATCH requests to the OpenSearch APIs

actions.name: ESHttpPost
actions.description: Grants permission to send HTTP POST requests to the OpenSearch APIs

actions.name: ESHttpPut
actions.description: Grants permission to send HTTP PUT requests to the OpenSearch APIs

actions.name: GetApplication
actions.description: Grants permission to get information about an OpenSearch Application

actions.name: GetCompatibleElasticsearchVersions
actions.description: Grants permission to fetch a list of compatible OpenSearch and Elasticsearch versions to which an OpenSearch Service domain can be upgraded. This permission is deprecated. Use GetCompatibleVersions instead

actions.name: GetCompatibleVersions
actions.description: Grants permission to fetch list of compatible engine versions to which an OpenSearch Service domain can be upgraded

actions.name: GetDataSource
actions.description: Grants permission to get the data source for the OpenSearch Service domain

actions.name: GetDomainMaintenanceStatus
actions.description: Grants permission to retrieve the status of maintenance action for the node

actions.name: GetPackageVersionHistory
actions.description: Grants permission to fetch the version history for a package

actions.name: GetUpgradeHistory
actions.description: Grants permission to fetch the upgrade history of a given OpenSearch Service domain

actions.name: GetUpgradeStatus
actions.description: Grants permission to fetch the upgrade status of a given OpenSearch Service domain

actions.name: ListApplications
actions.description: Grants permission to list OpenSearch Applications

actions.name: ListDataSources
actions.description: Grants permission to retrieve a list of data source for the OpenSearch Service domain

actions.name: ListDomainMaintenances
actions.description: Grants permission to retrieve a list of maintenance actions for the OpenSearch Service domain

actions.name: ListDomainNames
actions.description: Grants permission to display the names of all OpenSearch Service domains that the current user owns

actions.name: ListDomainsForPackage
actions.description: Grants permission to list all OpenSearch Service domains that a package is associated with

actions.name: ListElasticsearchInstanceTypeDetails
actions.description: Grants permission to list all instance types and available features for a given OpenSearch version. This permission is deprecated. Use ListInstanceTypeDetails instead

actions.name: ListElasticsearchInstanceTypes
actions.description: Grants permission to list all EC2 instance types that are supported for a given OpenSearch version

actions.name: ListElasticsearchVersions
actions.description: Grants permission to list all supported OpenSearch versions on Amazon OpenSearch Service. This permission is deprecated. Use ListVersions instead

actions.name: ListInstanceTypeDetails
actions.description: Grants permission to list all instance types and available features for a given OpenSearch or Elasticsearch version

actions.name: ListPackagesForDomain
actions.description: Grants permission to list all packages associated with the OpenSearch Service domain

actions.name: ListScheduledActions
actions.description: Grants permission to retrieve a list of configuration changes that are scheduled for a OpenSearch Service domain

actions.name: ListTags
actions.description: Grants permission to display all resource tags for an OpenSearch Service domain

actions.name: ListVersions
actions.description: Grants permission to list all supported OpenSearch and Elasticsearch versions in Amazon OpenSearch Service

actions.name: ListVpcEndpointAccess
actions.description: Grants permission to retrieve information about each AWS principal that is allowed to access a given Amazon OpenSearch Service domain through the use of an interface VPC endpoint

actions.name: ListVpcEndpoints
actions.description: Grants permission to retrieve all Amazon OpenSearch Service-managed VPC endpoints in the current AWS account and Region

actions.name: ListVpcEndpointsForDomain
actions.description: Grants permission to retrieve all Amazon OpenSearch Service-managed VPC endpoints associated with a particular domain

actions.name: PurchaseReservedElasticsearchInstanceOffering
actions.description: Grants permission to purchase OpenSearch Service Reserved Instances. This permission is deprecated. Use PurchaseReservedInstanceOffering instead

actions.name: PurchaseReservedInstanceOffering
actions.description: Grants permission to purchase OpenSearch reserved instances

actions.name: RejectInboundConnection
actions.description: Grants permission to the destination domain owner to reject an inbound cross-cluster search connection request

actions.name: RejectInboundCrossClusterSearchConnection
actions.description: Grants permission to the destination domain owner to reject an inbound cross-cluster search connection request. This permission is deprecated. Use RejectInboundConnection instead

actions.name: RemoveTags
actions.description: Grants permission to remove resource tags from an OpenSearch Service domain

actions.name: RevokeVpcEndpointAccess
actions.description: Grants permission to revoke access to an Amazon OpenSearch Service domain that was provided through an interface VPC endpoint

actions.name: StartDomainMaintenance
actions.description: Grants permission to initiate the maintenance on the node

actions.name: StartElasticsearchServiceSoftwareUpdate
actions.description: Grants permission to start a service software update of a domain. This permission is deprecated. Use StartServiceSoftwareUpdate instead

actions.name: StartServiceSoftwareUpdate
actions.description: Grants permission to start a service software update of a domain

actions.name: UpdateApplication
actions.description: Grants permission to update an OpenSearch Application

actions.name: UpdateDataSource
actions.description: Grants permission to update the data source for the OpenSearch Service domain

actions.name: UpdateDomainConfig
actions.description: Grants permission to modify the configuration of an OpenSearch Service domain, such as the instance type or number of instances

actions.name: UpdateElasticsearchDomainConfig
actions.description: Grants permission to modify the configuration of an OpenSearch Service domain, such as the instance type or number of instances. This permission is deprecated. Use UpdateDomainConfig instead

actions.name: UpdatePackage
actions.description: Grants permission to update a package for use with OpenSearch Service domains

actions.name: UpdateScheduledAction
actions.description: Grants permission to reschedule a planned OpenSearch Service domain configuration change for a later time

actions.name: UpdateVpcEndpoint
actions.description: Grants permission to modify an Amazon OpenSearch Service-managed interface VPC endpoint

actions.name: UpgradeDomain
actions.description: Grants permission to initiate upgrade of an OpenSearch Service domain to a given version

actions.name: UpgradeElasticsearchDomain
actions.description: Grants permission to initiate upgrade of an OpenSearch Service domain to a specified version. This permission is deprecated. Use UpgradeDomain instead
